spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warlock's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Prone to Possession
entries: When the warlock is reduced below half it's hitpoints (16 or less), it must make a {@dc 15} charisma saving throw. If they fail, they are possessed by Mammok and transform into a {@creature Nergaliid|EGW} that is under Mammok's control. This transformation is permanent. It must repeat this saving throw at the beginning of each of it's turns that it starts with 16 hitpoints or less.

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The xvart's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. it can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The xvart is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Cunning
entries: Vebshi can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: The Odds are in My Favor
entries: Vebshi has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.
